name: Shooty Game (Srayan Jana)
description:
• Multiplayer platform shooter
  • We have online multiplayer (take that nerds)
  • We have local multiplayer
  • MKB and Controller support
  • 2 characters, one map (more can be done eventually, not part of our MVP)
  • Can choose teams
  • :)

Controls:

WASD to move around

Space to jump

Mouse left click to shoot

Mouse right-click to dash

Move your cursor to aim.
